    Subclasses of Widget in dev.gamekit.ui.widgets
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Align
    A SingleChildParent which aligns its single child within itself
    class 
    Button
    A Widget which can be clicked to trigger an event
    class 
    Center
    An Align which centers its single child
    class 
    Column
    A Flex which arranges its children vertically
    class 
    Decorated
    A SingleChildParent which paints provides a shape, background color and border decorations
    class 
    Empty
    A Widget with zero size which renders nothing.
    class 
    FixedSize
    A SingleChildParent which enforces a fixed size on its child
    class 
    Flex
    A MultiChildParent which arranges its children linearly along one axis
    class 
    Image
    A Widget which renders a BufferedImage to the screen
    class 
    IntrinsicHeight
    A SingleChildParent which limits the computed height of its single child to the child's intrinsic height
    class 
    IntrinsicSize
    A SingleChildParent which limits the computed size of its single child to the child's intrinsic size
    class 
    IntrinsicWidth
    A SingleChildParent which limits the computed width of its single child to the child's intrinsic width
    class 
    MultiChildParent
    A parent which contains multiple child Widgets
    class 
    NinePatch
    A SingleChildParent which uses the 9-patch algorithm to render a BufferedImage as a background to its descendants
    class 
    Padding
    A SingleChildParent which adds padding around its single child
    class 
    Parent
    A parent is a Widget which can contain one or more children.
    class 
    Row
    A Flex which arranges its children horizontally
    class 
    SingleChildParent
    A parent which contains only one child Widget
    class 
    Stack
    A MultiChildParent which stacks its children on top of each other
    class 
    Text
    A Widget which renders text to the screen
